name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Nathaniel WEST; COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Derrick SIMMONS
docket_number: Appeal No. 82 E.D. Appeal Dkt. 1987; Appeal No. 94 E.D. Appeal Dkt. 1987

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and STOUT, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Nathaniel WEST. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Derrick SIMMONS.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
The Orders of the Superior Court are vacated and the matters are remanded to the Superior Court for consideration of the remaining issues raised on appeal. See e.g., Commonwealth v. Baker, 511 Pa. 1, 511 A.2d 777 (1986).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Gaele McLaughlin Barthold, Deputy Dist. Atty., Ronald Eisenberg, Chief, Appeals Div., Karen Grigsby, Philadelphia, for the Com.
Thomas Bruno, II, Philadelphia, for Nathaniel West.
Jeffrey M. Voluck, Philadelphia, for Derrick Simmons.
casebody.head_matter:
541 A.2d 739
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Nathaniel WEST. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Derrick SIMMONS.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Jan. 22, 1988.
Decided May 20, 1988.
Gaele McLaughlin Barthold, Deputy Dist. Atty., Ronald Eisenberg, Chief, Appeals Div., Karen Grigsby, Philadelphia, for the Com.
Thomas Bruno, II, Philadelphia, for Nathaniel West.
Jeffrey M. Voluck, Philadelphia, for Derrick Simmons.
Prior Report: 358 Pa.Super. 609, 518 A.2d 307.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and STOUT, JJ.
